name: Battery
description:
This game was created for 39th Ludum Dare (Running out of power).

In the near future, humans will changes, transhumanism has become something in common. But the main people are not agree with this things and human bots are jailed.

You control one of this human and you try to escape of the prison. Be careful, because the keepers can drain your battery (your power)  if they saw you. You don't have any gun or weapon, and if you are touch by a keeper, you die. You can destroy the wall with the space key.
